Purpose To investigate the clinicopathological features and differential diagnosis of chondromyxoid fibroma - like osteosarcoma ( CMF - like OS ).
目的探讨软骨黏液样纤维瘤样骨肉瘤 ( CMF -like OS ) 的临床病理学特征及鉴别诊断.
Turaev to construct Hennings - like and Kuperberg - like invariants of principal π - bundles over link complements and over 3 - manifolds.
Turaev在研究3维流形及上链环上主π - 丛的Heningslike与Kuperberg -like 不变量的基础上引进的一类代数结构,是Hopf代数 的推广,其中π为一离散群.
Methods A case of CMF - like OS was analyzed by light microscopy and studied by immunohistochemistry.
方法对1例CMF-like OS进行病理形态学以及免疫组化分析.
The CBL ( calcineurin B - like ) protein family represents a unique group of calcium sensors in plants.
CBL ( calcineurinB -like protein ) 家族就是植物细胞中一类特异的钙结合元件.
Mycosporine - like amino acids ( MAAs ) strongly absorb UVR and protect cells against harmful UVR.
类菌孢素氨基酸(mycosporine-like aminoacids,间称MAAs ) 存在于许多生物体内,对紫外辐射 ( UVR) 有较高的吸收能力,被认为有保护细胞、减少UVR损伤的功能.
